title: Filter stable input
description: Use FFT and spline-based filtering to detect and extract stable regions

FilterSplines.description: FilterSplines class: FFT based spline filtering of MD (energy) trajectories

fftfreq.description: Filter frequencies higher than X. The higher the number, the more bumps.

gradco.description: Gradient cutoff: if value higher than X, the gradient is high enough, there is a change

gradcl.description: Clean 0.1*length from start and end (0 means no cleaning, recommended. Only use with FFTfreq ~5 and lower)

minlength.description: Minimal length of stable data (in datapoints, not time!)

extend.description: If stable stretch is longer then minlength, use full stretch if TRUE

doublespline.description: Perform double spline fitting on FFT output (recommended)

splinesmooth.description: Smoothness of the spline (low is smoother, 0 gives the orig data back)
